text: Tara kaphera, yara bale ye, marimaya-tanaya masiha-i allaha; athaca masiha balena, he bani-isara'ila, tomara allahara ebadata kara, yini amara palana karta ebam tomadera'o palanakarta. Niscaya ye byakti allahara sathe ansidara sthira kare, allaha tara jan'ye jannata harama kare dena. Ebam tara basasthana haya jahannama. Atyacaridera kona sahayyakari ne'i.
